author: RTÉ Entertainment
title: Metallica stream full Slane show
description: Metallica are streaming their entire Slane concert from June 2019 on their YouTube channel as part of a new move to give fans an archive concert every week during the Covid19 crisis.
content:
Metallica are streaming their entire Slane concert from June 2019 on their YouTube channel as part of a new move to give fans an archive concert every week during the Covid19 crisis.
Every Monday night at 8:00pm  (US Eastern Time), Metallica have promised to… [+692 chars]
